title: Gwyneth Paltrow, 47, and Paris Jackson, 21, strike up a friendship on the purple carpet
text:
Gwyneth Paltrow has a new famous friend.

On Thursday evening the Goop founder was seen shaking the hand of Michael Jackson's daughter Paris Jackson at the amFAR Gala in Los Angeles.

Both wore long gowns as they took their time on the purple carpet saying hello and posing side-by-side.

Meet n greet: Gwyneth Paltrow has a new friend. On Thursday evening the Goop founder was seen shaking the hand of Michael Jackson's daughter Paris Jackson at the amFAR Gala in Los Angeles

Glam showdown: Both wore long gowns as they took their time on the red carpet

The two cover girls both come from famous families.

Gwyneth's mother is the respected actress Blythe Danner, 76, who has lit up I'll See You In My Dreams and Meet The Fockers.

She also appeared on Will & Grace for several years.

Something in common: The two both come from famous families. Gwyneth's mother is the respected actress Blythe Danner, 76, who has lit up I'll See You In My Dreams and Meet The Fockers. Paris' father is the late Michael Jackson

Paltrow's father is the late Bruce Paltrow who was behind the TV series St Elsewhere. He also directed his daughter in the movie Duets.

Paris' father is the King Of Pop Michael Jackson who made the songs Bad, Billy Jean and Thriller. He died in 2009 from with anesthetic propofol and the anxiolytic lorazepam in his system.

Though Gwyneth and Paris looked like they could be sisters, the Oscar-winning Emma star could actually be Paris' mother. At 47, she is 26 years older than 21-year-old Paris.

Age difference: Though Gwyneth and Paris looked like they could be sisters, the Oscar-winning Emma star could actually be Paris' mother. At 47, she is 26 years older than 21-year-old Paris

Paris is only six years older than Gwyneth's eldest child, daughter Apple Martin, 15.

The musician wore a silky rose gold gown with a lace panel. Her tattoos were on display with her hair partially back.

The siren was with her beau Gabriel Glenn, 20, who was dapper in a suit with his hair parted to the side.

Her beau didn't break his stern look while walking the carpet with his lady love.

He had his long brunette hair pulled to the side in a dramatic side part as he stared down the cameras.

For the occasion the star sported an all black suit that had a long tassel tie around the neck.

These two love birds have been together for a little over a year and celebrated the milestone back in April with a heartfelt post on Instagram.

Good cause: Paris and Gabriel Glenn were rocking an edgy style and attitude as they posed for the cameras together on the purple carpet

Stunning: The model wore a blush-colored satin gown that had a jeweled accent on the left side of her chest

'You're the light of my life. thank you for making me the happiest and luckiest girl in the world. Happy anniversary baby can't wait for another trip around the sun,' she wrote alongside the collection of photos of the two.

Paris is most definitely following in the footsteps of her late father Michael Jackson as she continues to tour and sing in the band with her lover called, The Soundflowers.

Earlier this month it was revealed that the band was close to signing their first record deal together.
description: Gwyneth Paltrow has a new friend. On Thursday evening the Goop founder was seen shaking the hand of Michael Jackson's daughter Paris Jackson at the amFAR Gala in Los Angeles.
